contest-event.event-date:
April 25, 1982 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Civic Hall, Holmfirth March contest - 1st(£10 and cup) Hepworth 86, 2nd(£5) Slaithwaite 83. Hymn tune contest - 1st(£15 and cup) Boarshurst 83, 2nd(£5) Hepworth 82. Prizes - 1st £60 and cup, 2nd £35, 3rd £25, 4th £15. 4 bands competed. 56th annual contest.
April 4, 2012, 8:40 p.m. June 26, 2016, 9:43 a.m.
1 Slaithwaite Band Tony Whitaker Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Langford]
2 Hade Edge Jack Fisher The Aeronauts
3 Hepworth (Cookson Homes) Peter Wadsworth Variations on a Ninth
Unknown Result Boarshurst Silver Band Bryan Garside Tournament for Brass
Withdrawn Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Unknown
Withdrawn Skelmanthorpe Band J. Kenyon
Withdrawn Yorkshire Traction Edward Griffiths
